actions.name: ActivateEC2Remote
actions.description: Grants permission to start the Amazon EC2 instance that your AWS Cloud9 IDE connects to

actions.name: CreateEnvironmentEC2
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Cloud9 development environment, launches an Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) instance, and then hosts the environment on the instance

actions.name: CreateEnvironmentMembership
actions.description: Grants permission to add an environment member to an AWS Cloud9 development environment

actions.name: CreateEnvironmentSSH
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Cloud9 SSH development environment

actions.name: CreateEnvironmentToken
actions.description: Grants permission to create an authentication token that allows a connection between the AWS Cloud9 IDE and the user's environment

actions.name: DeleteEnvironment
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Cloud9 development environment. If the environment is hosted on an Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) instance, also terminates the instance

actions.name: DeleteEnvironmentMembership
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an environment member from an AWS Cloud9 development environment

actions.name: DescribeEC2Remote
actions.description: Grants permission to get details about the connection to the EC2 development environment, including host, user, and port

actions.name: DescribeEnvironmentMemberships
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about environment members for an AWS Cloud9 development environment

actions.name: DescribeEnvironmentStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to get status information for an AWS Cloud9 development environment

actions.name: DescribeEnvironments
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about AWS Cloud9 development environments

actions.name: DescribeSSHRemote
actions.description: Grants permission to get details about the connection to the SSH development environment, including host, user, and port

actions.name: GetEnvironmentConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to get configuration information that's used to initialize the AWS Cloud9 IDE

actions.name: GetEnvironmentSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to get the AWS Cloud9 IDE settings for a specified development environment

actions.name: GetMembershipSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to get the AWS Cloud9 IDE settings for a specified environment member

actions.name: GetMigrationExperiences
actions.description: Grants permission to get the migration experience for a cloud9 user

actions.name: GetUserPublicKey
actions.description: Grants permission to get the user's public SSH key, which is used by AWS Cloud9 to connect to SSH development environments

actions.name: GetUserSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to get the AWS Cloud9 IDE settings for a specified user

actions.name: ListEnvironments
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of AWS Cloud9 development environment identifiers

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for a cloud9 environment

actions.name: ModifyTemporaryCredentialsOnEnvironmentEC2
actions.description: Grants permission to set AWS managed temporary credentials on the Amazon EC2 instance that's used by the AWS Cloud9 integrated development environment (IDE)

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to a cloud9 environment

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a cloud9 environment

actions.name: UpdateEnvironment
actions.description: Grants permission to change the settings of an existing AWS Cloud9 development environment

actions.name: UpdateEnvironmentMembership
actions.description: Grants permission to change the settings of an existing environment member for an AWS Cloud9 development environment

actions.name: UpdateEnvironmentSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to update the AWS Cloud9 IDE settings for a specified development environment

actions.name: UpdateMembershipSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to update the AWS Cloud9 IDE settings for a specified environment member

actions.name: UpdateSSHRemote
actions.description: Grants permission to update details about the connection to the SSH development environment, including host, user, and port

actions.name: UpdateUserSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to update IDE-specific settings of an AWS Cloud9 user

actions.name: ValidateEnvironmentName
actions.description: Grants permission to validate the environment name during the process of creating an AWS Cloud9 development environment
